Summary With an ever expanding and diverse background of electrical & mechanical engineering, sustainable green energy design, systems test/tool design and lean manufacturing processes, I am a versatile and strong contribution to all teams that I am privileged to work on.  
 
My formal education training consists of an AS in Electrical Engineering Technology and a BS in Sustainable Design (Green Energy). Those two disciplines have been supported by and added to by work in micro electronics failure analysis, the lean manufacturing of electronics and semi-conductors and R&D design engineering.  
 
Recent work has given me the opportunity to ascend to new heights in my career... 80-100 meters above the earth inside the nacelle of our countries wind turbines where I have been deploying our condition monitoring equipment.. This opportunity is supported by wind turbine ascent and emergency descent certification and Mobius Institute Vibration Analysis training.
